mtc:Taxon.name: Measure.Coefficient.Voltage.Pressure.AC.RMS.Differential.RMS.PressureField
mtc:Taxon.mtc:Definition: Pressure sensitivity level is the sound pressure level at a given audio signal level. The primary standard for sound pressure in air is defined as the microphone calibration procedure reciprocity method, defined in IEC 61094-2:2009.Pressure reciprocity relies on pairs of microphones which are coupled acoutsically, so that when one is driven electrically,the other experiences the resulting acoustic pressure and produces an electrical response.

mtc:Result.name: Sound Pressure Level measured in Volt/Pa (Voltage over Pressure)

mtc:Taxon.name: Measure.Power.Ultrasonic
mtc:Taxon.mtc:Definition: Measure of ultrasonic power in liquid is based on the measurement of radiation force using a gravimetric balance.The acoustic power radiated from the transducer can be related to the radiation force measured by an electronic balance.
